medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient awoke at 2 AM with severe abdominal pain located initially in the back, then moving to the epigastric region. Significant reduction in oral appetite noted over the past 2 months. Denies significant nausea, loss of appetite, fever, jaundice, or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Highly functioning autism, anxiety disorder, obesity status post gastric bypass, seizure disorder (epilepsy, last seizure at age unspecified), psoriatic arthritis, polycystic ovary syndrome, seasonal allergies, asthma, and breast reduction surgery with complications of blood loss anemia.
medical_history.family_history: Son has ADHD and possible PDD. Brother has bipolar disorder and a history of substance abuse.
medical_history.social_history: Patient lives at home with her son who has autism/Asperger's. No other social history specified.
